about.title: About
about.description: I am Marta Pinedo, a lawyer specialising in civil and commercial law. My experience in family law firms, large companies and courts has enabled me to develop skills in dispute resolution, case management and contract review. I currently practise at EJO Abogados and in my own practice, where I prioritise clear communication and personalised service. In my free time, I enjoy reading and activities that help me maintain a healthy personal balance.

asesoria.name: Legal Advice & Consultancy
asesoria.description: Civil, commercial and administrative law support to help you make informed legal decisions with confidence.

redaccion.name: Contract Review & Drafting
redaccion.description: I ensure clear, secure contracts that protect your interests and help prevent disputes.

representacion.name: Legal Representation in Litigation
representacion.description: I defend your case with dedication and a personal approach, from preparation through hearings.

gestion.name: Administration Proceedings Management
gestion.description: I manage summons, fines and other procedures so you can meet legal obligations without hassle.

resolucion.name: Alternative Dispute Resolution
resolucion.description: I pursue peaceful solutions via mediation and negotiation to avoid litigation and preserve relationships.
